1.description: SÃ¸ren is a prolific player on PS4.  He is an avid raider and a terrible Crucible player.  He can also be reached via Twitter @soren42.

2.description: Tracon plays on PS4, usually in the evenings around reset day and on the occasional weekend afternoon.  He collects titles and is an excellent PvE and PvP player.

3.description: NotDisliked is our lead PC Admin. He's a devoted raider, even having a first 24 hour clear under his belt! You can find him online sporadically but often, as his university schedule varies.

4.description: Rogue is our lead XBox Admin. She's an amazing graphic artist and avid gamer. Her clan, Art of Mayhem, became part of the Solarian family at the beginning of 2019.

5.description: Engraham is a long-serving admin of our XBox arm. With the clan merger, he's really stepped up to help out the larger group — even if he does go to sleep before the sun sets!

6.description: Freak is our man-about-platform, regularly playing on both PS4 and PC. He's a Crucible juggernaut and a master raider.

7.description: Kev plays around his work & family schedule.  Destiny always holds new & amazing things in store for him, regardless of how long he's played.

8.description: Friendly co-leads our Crucible team for PS4. He can often be found railing against matchmaking, engram RNG, and his network connection.

9.description: Dup co-leads our Crucible team for console. He is our most active streamer, often found sharing his PvP exploits with his Twitch audience.

10.description: Marshall is our PS4 Raid Captain. With over 230 hours spent raiding in the Destiny series, his passion for team endgame activities is an asset to our community and his teams!

11.description: Evil is our PS4 PvE Co-Captain.  He leads our PS4 clan into Nightfalls, strikes, dungeons, and forges — he also ensures we get the Clan Nightfall Engram each week!

12.description: Alphonse is our PS4 PvE Co-Captain.  He takes the lead in ensuring that PS4 players in the Mountain and Pacific timezones have Nightfall, strikes, raids, and other PvE activities each week.

13.description: Maxieboy is our first PC Raid Guide.  He sherpas players through all of Destiny 2's raids, teaches encounters, and helps players become more comfortable with raiding in the clan.

14.description: Sonnie is our PS4 PvE Guide.  He not only teaches players PvE strategies, but he's always willing to jump in and lend his clanmates a hand with the most challenging of endgame activities.
